page.title: 02Arts and Crafts
page.content: There is every opportunity to learn and improve all sorts of crafts with evening classes in: upholstery, painting, dressmaking. embroidery, woodwork, welding, and many others. Classes are run by the Education Authority in Bromyard, Malvern, and Hereford, and in Stanford Bishop Vill- age hall. The Women's Institute arranges speakers and demonstrations. Many people practise crafts like cake icing and flower arranging for local weddings and birthdays, and for competitions. Rugs and kneelers are made for the church, and curtains for the village hall. Many in the area enter for competitions at Bromyard Gala which includes painting, photo- graphy, woodwork, flower arranging, cookery, country wines, patchwork, and handicrafts. Matches are held for ploughing with tractors and horses.
